title: Concept
description: Defines a language-independent semantic concept. A Concept represents meaning, not behavior, structure, or implementation.

concept.title: Concept Identifier
concept.description: Canonical, language-independent identifier of the concept. This identifier represents meaning, not a word.

version.title: Concept Version
version.description: Immutable version of the concept definition. Once published, a version must not change.

definition.title: Concept Definition
definition.description: Normative textual definition that specifies the meaning of the concept. This definition is authoritative.
examples: A natural person who has an identity in the system and can perform authenticated actions.
